metadata.name: Year of the Tiger
metadata.description:
2022 is Year of a Tiger

In the Chinese zodiac tigers traditionally symbolize strength, bravery and wisdom. 
According to Chinese folklore, the tiger placed third in the race set by the Jade Emperor that assigned the animals their positions in the lunar calendar.

----------------------------------------------------------
This design is a 30 sec looping animation in mp4.

The collector for this NFT would receive a 1500px X 1500px high resolution movie file. Please notify the artist after purchase.
